<a id="VisualShaderNodeUIntParameter"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeUIntParameter

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeParameter](VisualShaderNodeParameter.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A visual shader node for shader parameter (uniform) of type unsigned [int](int.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A [VisualShaderNodeParameter](VisualShaderNodeParameter.md) of type unsigned [int](int.md). Offers additional customization for range of accepted values.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="VisualShaderNodeUIntParameter_property_default_value"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **default_value** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeUIntParameter_property_default_value)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_default_value**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_default_value**\ (\ )

Default value of this parameter, which will be used if not set externally. [default_value_enabled](VisualShaderNodeUIntParameter.md#VisualShaderNodeUIntParameter_property_default_value_enabled) must be enabled; defaults to ``0`` otherwise.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="VisualShaderNodeUIntParameter_property_default_value_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **default_value_enabled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeUIntParameter_property_default_value_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_default_value_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_default_value_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the node will have a custom default value.
